name: SantaNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: Stay up to date with the latest Santa gossip and news! The Santa News skill will keep you up to date on the goings on of your favorite jolly old elf.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
